trans-unit.source: Specifies the current stage of a ClickOnce download operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定 ClickOnce 下载操作的当前阶段。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState> is passed by way of the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A> member of <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs>, which is used by the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>, and <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState> 通过传递<xref:System.Deployment.Application.DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A>的成员<xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs>，后者由<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>， <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>，和<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the members of this enumeration to determine what portion of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment has already been downloaded to the local machine.
trans-unit.target: 使用此枚举的成员来确定的哪些部分[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]部署已经下载到本地计算机。

trans-unit.source: The following code example installs the latest [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application update asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例安装最新[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]异步更新应用程序。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] is downloading the DLLs and data files that comprised the application.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 正在下载组成应用程序的 DLL 和数据文件。
[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 正在下载应用程序清单。
